content: DCH 230 Electric cutter Dry electric hand-held diamond cutter – cutting depth up to 85 mm with 230 mm blade ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Concrete saws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Delivers 50% more cutting depth than typical angle grinders Ensures a virtually dust-free job site when used with a compatible vacuum cleaner Achieve even greater productivity gains by using with specifically-developed Hilti cutting discs Protection against overheating and overloading protection – prolongs the tools lifetime and increases the operators safety Applications Cutting reinforced concrete, granite curbstones, slabs, brick and masonry blocks Cutting metal beams, steel pipes and reinforcing bars Preliminary cuts for controlled demolition Cutting and extending openings for windows, doors and shafts For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Disc diameter: 9 in Cutting depth: 3 in No load RPM: gear 1: 6500 rpm Technical Data | Disc diameter | 9 in | Cutting depth | 3 in | No load RPM | gear 1: 6500 rpm | Triaxial vibration value for cutting concrete slab (ah) | 4.7 m/s² | 1 | Arbor size | 22.2 mm | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 102.5 dB (A) | 2 | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 26.4 x 9.4 x 8.3 in | Wet or dry operation | Dry | According to the applicable product standard (see Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3583189 - DCH 230 + Slitting Conversion Set + VC 300-17 X + (6) SPX 7 Diamond - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DCH 230 120V Diamond cutter - 1x SW 24/10 Installation wrench - 1x SW 6 Screw driver - 1x VC 300-17 X 120V woS Univ. vacuum cleaner - 6x Dia blade 7x5/8-7/8-DM (6) SPX univ - 2x Adapter NEMA 5-20P / 5-15P - 1x Depth gauge DCH 230 - 1x Slitting adapter DCH 230 / 180-SL - 3564392 - DCH 230 VC 300 pkg - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DCH 230 120V Diamond cutter - 1x SW 24/10 Installation wrench - 1x SW 6 Screw driver - 1x VC 300-17 X 120V woS Univ. vacuum cleaner - 1x Dia blade 9x5/8-7/8 SPX univ - 1x Depth gauge DCH 230 - 2x Adapter NEMA 5-20P / 5-15P - 3444488 - Diam cutter kit DCH 230 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DCH 230 120V Diamond cutter - 1x SW 24/10 Installation wrench - 1x SW 6 Screw driver - 1x Adapter NEMA 5-20P / 5-15P
